<!-- @generated by usage-cli from usage spec -->
# `pitchfork run`

- **Usage**: `pitchfork run [-f --force] [--retry <RETRY>] <ID> [-- RUN]…`
- **Aliases**: `r`

Runs a one-off daemon

## Arguments

### `<ID>`

Name of the daemon to run

### `[-- RUN]…`

## Flags

### `-f --force`

### `--retry <RETRY>`

Number of times to retry on error exit
